short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Routes urls to desired user profiles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to configure Chrome to move opened tabs to other connected user profiles. As you may know, every user profile allows for a separate security context. For example, if you have set up a personal and a work user profile, this extension can move your work related sites automatically to your work profile, and your personal sites to your personal profile. The extension requires you to set up rules based on regular expression matching with the url.
